nodes.documentation:
@title Artists burning contract for KnownOrigin (KODA)
* Allows for the edition artists to burn unsold editions or reduce the supply of sold ones
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
* BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.
nodes.name: ArtistEditionBurner

deactivateOrReduceEditionSupply(uint256).details: Sets the provided edition to either a deactivated state or reduces the available supply to zeroOnly callable from edition artists defined in KODA NFT contractOnly callable when contract is not pausedReverts if edition is invalidReverts if edition is not active in KDOA NFT contract

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setKodavV2(address).details: Sets the KODA addressOnly callable from owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

devdoc.title: Artists burning contract for KnownOrigin (KODA) * Allows for the edition artists to burn unsold editions or reduce the supply of sold ones * https://www.knownorigin.io/ * BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
